text.body: Scottish celebrity chef restaurateur television personality His restaurants been awarded Michelin stars total currently hold

Ramsay s signature restaurant Restaurant Gordon Ramsay Chelsea London held Michelin stars since Ramsay known presenting TV programmes competitive cookery food such as British series Hell s Kitchen F Word Ramsay s Kitchen Nightmares along American versions Hell s Kitchen Kitchen Nightmares MasterChef
Gordon Ramsay born on November Johnstone Renfrewshire Scotland raised Stratford upon Avon Warwickshire England age Ramsay second four children

In early s he worked as commis chef at Wroxton House Hotel then ran kitchen seat dining room at Wickham Arms until his sexual relationship owner s wife made situation difficult Ramsay then moved to London where he worked series restaurants until being inspired to work temperamental Marco Pierre White at Harvey s

Upon his return to London Ramsay offered position head chef under chef patron Pierre Koffmann at Three Michelin starred La Tante Claire Chelsea Shortly thereafter Marco Pierre White re entered his life offering to set him up head chef position share Rossmore owned by White s business partners
The restaurant renamed Aubergine went on to win first Michelin star fourteen months later Aubergine won second Michelin star
Ramsay opened his own restaurant Chelsea Restaurant Gordon Ramsay help his father in law Chris Hutcheson restaurant gained third Michelin star making Ramsay first Scot to achieve feat

From his first restaurant Ramsay s empire expanded rapidly next opening Petrus then Amaryllis Glasgow which he later forced to close later Gordon Ramsay at Claridge s Restaurants at Dubai Creek Connaught hotels followed latter branded his prot g Angela Hartnett s name

However February Danny Lavy owner restaurant announced restaurant disassociating itself Ramsay citing lack involvement understanding on Ramsay s part restaurant closed Along way he also hired his friend matre d Jean Philippe Susilovic who works London at Petrus also appears on TV show Hell s Kitchen

Opened Restaurant Gordon Ramsay Ramsay s first solo restaurant located at Royal Hospital Road London voted Top Restaurant UK London Zagat Survey awarded third Michelin star making Gordon Ramsay first Scottish chef to win three Michelin stars

On July Ramsay won Catey award Independent Restaurateur Year becoming only third person to won three Catey awards biggest awards UK hospitality industry Ramsay s two previous Catey awards were Newcomer Year Chef Year other two triple winners Michel Roux Jacquie Pern

n Ramsay appeared two British television series Ramsay s Kitchen Nightmares aired on Channel saw chef troubleshooting failing restaurants over one week period series ran fifth series Hell s Kitchen reality show aired on ITV saw Ramsay attempt to train ten British celebrities to be chefs as they ran restaurant on Brick Lane opened to public two week duration show

Scottish by birth Gordon Ramsay brought up Stratford upon Avon England His dedication natural talent led him to train some world s leading chefs such as Albert Roux Marco Pierre White London Guy Savoy Jo l Robuchon France

In Gordon became chef Aubergine London within three years awarded two Michelin stars at age Ramsay set up his first wholly owned namesake restaurant Restaurant Gordon Ramsay quickly received most prestigious accolade culinary world three Michelin stars
In Ramsay took reins newly opened Aubergine Within three years he earned two Michelin stars After breakup restaurant s backers Ramsay left Aubergine taking his staff him

Gordon Ramsay known as bete noir cooking world foul mouthed perfectionist who doesn t suffer fools gladly as famously recorded his treatment celebrities hugely successful TV shows Hell s Kitchens Ramsay s Kitchen Nightmares

Five years later Gordon joined famous Maxim s restaurant London as Chef de partie eventually followed by year at Harvey s Marco Pierre White s south London restaurant Still only his twenties Gordon moved to Le Gavroche to work alongside eminent Albert Roux
The master chef making soon realised he needed first hand experience intricacies classic French cooking he moved to France where he spent three years kitchens Guy Savoy Joel Robuchon

n what became water cooler television Ramsey s Hell s Kitchen saw volatile chef give variety micro celebrities memorable tongue lashing Ramsey branded celebrity chefs bunch whingers complained to press most stars hadn t done day s work their lives
Gordon lives his wife Tana children South London He regularly jogs home work late at night after long shift his central London restaurants
